bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: DL4J: GlobalPoolingLayer no-arg constructor doesn't have default for pooling type
bug.description:
NPE during training: <denchmark-code>.layer(new GlobalPoolingLayer()) </denchmark-code>
Runs OK: (defaults to max pooling) <denchmark-code>.layer(new GlobalPoolingLayer.Builder().build()) </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
